title: Pixel 3xl redirect function not working?
content: I am having trouble connecting to a work network that requires a redirect to a log on page. I have reset the network settings on my phone as well has 'forgotten' and 'reconnecting' to the network. My work network has a link to click on should a an automatic redirect be disabled, but my phone won't open the link either.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
